channel.title: Posts on heyo
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on heyo

item.title: Custom JavaScript and CSS
item.author: jane@doe.com (Jane Doe)
item.description: With custom CSS and JavaScript you can change pretty much anything in heyo appearance or functionality, and it’s pretty simple, too!

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.author: jane@doe.com (Jane Doe)
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Sketches!
item.author: jane@doe.com (Jane Doe)
item.description: Sketches are the pretty visualizations in heyo’s sidebar. The default ones were built using p5.js – a javascript library for creative coding.

item.title: Post Thumbnail
item.author: jane@doe.com (Jane Doe)
item.description: You can now add thumbnails to your posts in heyo!

item.title: Table of Contents
item.author: jane@doe.com (Jane Doe)
item.description: In heyo we can use the sidebar to display a Table of Contents!

item.title: Rendering Math Stuff
item.author: jane@doe.com (Jane Doe)
item.description: This article shows how to configure your site with heyo theme to display $\LaTeX$.

item.title: Badges
item.author: jane@doe.com (Jane Doe)
item.description: This article will show you how to add and customize badges in your posts.
